channel.title: [718/742] Bandos | 25 skills | Vorago | Boss pets | IronMan | T90 Gear | More!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]https://bandos.org/logo.png[/img] ￼[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UZBFIny.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Welcome to the 'Official' Bandos advertisement page on Rune-Server[/B][/SIZE] Bandos, what is so different? Well... Our Developers are constantly adding bug free content within the server, if you want something added just suggest and the developers will look right into it! We also have an amazing Cache Developer. Everything requested by players (which is reasonable) is added, it's a community based server. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3jnA58g.png[/img] [QUOTE][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2wqskl5.png[/img][FONT=microsoft sans serif][SIZE=4][URL=http://"https://bandos.org"]HOME[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT][B] [FONT=impact][SIZE=4] [/SIZE][/FONT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tTi2oem.png[/img][URL=http://"https://bandos.org/bandos.jar"][SIZE=4][FONT=microsoft sans serif]DOWNLOAD[/FONT][/SIZE][/URL][/B] [/QUOTE]
[size=12pt]:: Server benefits :: Runite, Adamant & Lava Dragons Great teleporting system via Spirit Tree at home Crystal Chest All Skills trainable Boss Pets (Rare Drop Table) Slayer Pets (Rare Drop Table) IronMan/HardCore Ironan (With Ironman Highscores) ~ Possible to train all skills. 104m Master Capes T90 Armours (Malevolent, Sirenic & Tectonic) T90 Weapons (Drygore, Noxious, Ascension) T85 Armours (Tetsu, Seasinger & Death Lotus) Master Cape Abilities Slayer Partner System Weekly Tasks System Achievement System Completionist Cape with Requirements Stable Shops Prestige system Highscore System In-Game Highscores In-Game Drop Logs In-Game Boss Kill Logs So much more! [COLOR=red]:: Bosses ::[/COLOR] Nex || Vorago || Sunfreet || WildyWyrm || Queen Black Dragon- Bandos || Saradomin || Zamorak - Armadly || Tormented Demons || Corperal Beast || - Jad || Kiln || King Black Dragon || MORE - [COLOR=red]:: MiniGames ::[/COLOR] Dominion Tower Pest Control Hunger Games Rise Of The Six Barrows Castle Wars Fight pits Duel Arena Clan wars Fight Caves Kiln So much much more![/size]
[SPOILER=MORE MEDIA] [IMG]https://i.imgur.com/jo1YevJ.jpg[/img] [IMG]https://i.imgur.com/qBIlSyW.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.imgur.com/tX6pO4X.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fkjVt74.jpg[/img] [IMG]https://i.imgur.com/BHHgdTP.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.imgur.com/vNCMFvi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6xR2O2I.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.imgur.com/MAyAKrY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FDisizk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FXO5OOF.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3OkfXzD.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nEPF1VY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pw4DgWS.jpg[/img] [IMG]https://i.imgur.com/y8IbH78.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.imgur.com/6THPmfs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fwgaxy7.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER][/CENTER]

item.description:
@Novarized wrote:

[CENTER]
￼
[SIZE=3]Welcome to the ‘Official’ Bandos advertisement page on Rune-Server[/SIZE]

Bandos, what is so different? Well…
Our Developers are constantly adding bug free content within the server, if you want something added just suggest and the developers will look right into it!
We also have an amazing Cache Developer.
Everything requested by players (which is reasonable) is added, it’s a community based server.

3jnA58g.png850×1350

[QUOTE][FONT=microsoft sans serif][SIZE=4]HOME[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=impact][SIZE=4]
[/SIZE][/FONT][SIZE=4][FONT=microsoft sans serif]DOWNLOAD[/FONT][/SIZE]
[/QUOTE]

[size=12pt]:: Server benefits :: Runite, Adamant & Lava Dragons Great teleporting system via Spirit Tree at home Crystal Chest All Skills trainable Boss Pets (Rare Drop Table) Slayer Pets (Rare Drop Table) IronMan/HardCore Ironan (With Ironman Highscores) ~ Possible to train all skills. 104m Master Capes T90 Armours (Malevolent, Sirenic & Tectonic) T90 Weapons (Drygore, Noxious, Ascension) T85 Armours (Tetsu, Seasinger & Death Lotus) Master Cape Abilities Slayer Partner System Weekly Tasks System Achievement System Completionist Cape with Requirements Stable Shops Prestige system Highscore System In-Game Highscores In-Game Drop Logs In-Game Boss Kill Logs So much more!

[COLOR=red]:: Bosses ::[/COLOR]
Nex || Vorago || Sunfreet || WildyWyrm || Queen Black Dragon-
